Frequently asked questions

Everything you need to know about Pagedone.

General

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s,

You will have access to download the full Figma project including all of the pages, the components, responsive pages, and also the icons, illustrations, and images included in the screens.

Good question! We used to ask this all the time. You don't realize the power of a high- quality UI kit until you start using one. A good UI kit saves you time and money usually spent on meticulously building the same components over and over again. It can 10- 100x your workflow. A good way to frame it is to ask the question, "will this UI kit save me a few hours of work in a project?" If the answer is YES, it's probably worth the investment. Then it becomes an asset you can use in unlimited future projects.

We built Pagedone out of necessity. We tried a bunch of UI kits for Figma, but found they lacked in size, flexibility, or quality — usually all three - and we ended up having to remake all the poor-quality components.

We are aware of the importance of well qualified support, that is why we decided that support will only be provided by the authors that actually worked on this project.

You can contact us on this page via email or discuss via the chatroom on the bottom right side of this page.

Feel free to join our Discord channel and let one of the project maintainers know that you have purchased Flowbite Pro. You will then have access to a private support channel.

Everything in Pagedone UI is designed and developed for the latest version of Tailwind CSS, which is currently Tailwind CSS v3.3.

Yes, Pagedone is designed to be responsive, making it suitable for various screen sizes and devices.

Yes, Pagedone is designed to be responsive, making it suitable for various screen sizes and devices.

Updates to Pagedone are based on industry trends, user feedback, and emerging design standards. Regular updates are scheduled to enhance and improve the system.

Yes, Pagedone is designed to be compatible with dark mode, providing a visually comfortable experience for users in low-light environments.

Yes, Pagedone provides recommended design patterns that contribute to a seamless and intuitive user experience.

Yes, Pagedone has a community forum, where users can ask questions, share experiences, and seek assistance.

Yes, we have a free version of Pagedone available for you to try out! It's an incredibly powerful and large UI kit for Figma in it's on right, but it doesn't use the latest

component property features announced at Config 2022 or the latest variables and Auto Layout 5.0 features announced at Config 2023. You can duplicate this free UI kit and use it in as many projects as you'd like.

The free version of Pagedone is essentially a slimmed-down version of the full UI kit. It includes global styles, basic components, and a few page examples. Try out the free version!

This design system does take full advantage of Figma's more advanced features, including nested components, variants, Auto Layout 5.0, interactive components, the new component properties announced at Config 2022 and the new variables and Auto Layout 5.0 features announced at Config 2023.

If you're new to Figma, or keen to learn best practices, check out our free version to see if it's a good fit. The full version will always be here whenever you are ready. We also recommend checking out Figma's Help Center for the best tutorials on these features.

You don't have to use variables if you don't want or need to!

The decision whether or not to use variables is entirely up to you. We've released two different versions of Pagedone Designer and Designer+ one that uses color, spacing, and radius variables and one that uses styles instead. Both are included so you can try them both and see which suits your workflow better!

Figma's Starter plan is 100% free for individuals. If you want to use more advanced features such as team libraries, dev mode, or multiple variable modes, you'll need to purchase a Professional plan. You can review Figma's pricing here.

Figma have generously announced all the paid perks of their plans are 100% free for students and educators! You can learn more at Figma Education.

Just a one-time payment! No recurring charges or surprises, we promise.

Yes, Pagedone is versatile and can be adapted for use in single-page applications, ensuring a consistent design language across different sections.

Once you have purchased either the design, code, or both packages, you will have access to all of the future updates based on the roadmap, free of charge.

A design system will help to streamline the design process, save valuable time and effort, eliminate redundancies, and focus on the creative aspects of your projects, all while delivering polished and visually appealing designs. It's a no-brainer.

Number one Pagedone is suitable for beginners and pros alike. While Pagedone uses advanced Figma features, those getting started will find value in the comprehensive library and the opportunity to learn the basics of UI Design.

Yes. You can use Pagedone for any number of client projects.

Yes, Pagedone is adaptable for various design needs, including e-commerce, providing a consistent and user-friendly experience for online shoppers.

Yes. Payment are processed by lemonsqueezy.com and are 128-bit SSL encrypted.

Yes, Pagedone is designed to integrate seamlessly with popular design tools, facilitating a smooth workflow for designers.

The components and templates in Pagedone UI are designed to work in the latest, stable releases of all major browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

We don't support Internet Explorer 11.

If you purchase a team license you can distribute the license account to as many as 10 team members.

If you need access to more than 10 team members, you can either contact us for a special agreement or purchase multiple team licenses which will subsequently increase the number of team members allowed to use Flowbite Pro.

After opening the checkout process, you will be able to add all of your personal or company information that you want to be available on the invoice. After the purchase, you will get an email with the invoice.

If you forgot to complete the information, or you didn't get the invoice by email, feel free to contact us and help you out with the invoice.

After you purchased one of the plans, you will get two emails: one for the invoice, and another one with the download files.

Soon we will create a way that you will be able to access the download files from the Flowbite dashboard from this website.

Unlike most other templates/themes, you don't have to buy a new Pagedone UI license every time you want to use it on a new project.

As long as what you're building is allowed as per the license, you can build as many sites as you want without ever having to buy an additional license. For more information and examples, read through our license.

Yep! As long as what you're building is some sort of actual website and not a derivative component library, theme builder, or other product where the primary purpose is clearly to repackage and redistribute our components, it's totally okay for that project to be open source.

For more information and examples of what is and isn't okay, read through our license.

No, you cannot use Pagedone UI to create derivative products like themes, UI kits, page builders, or anything else where you would be repackaging and redistributing our components or templates for someone else to use to build their own sites.

For more information and examples of what is and isn't okay, read through our license.

Pagedone UI is a self-serve product, meaning that while we do offer customer support for things like account management and licensing related concerns, the expectation is that customers have the requisite knowledge of Tailwind CSS, HTML, React, and Vue to use the product successfully.

Because every project is different and the way independently authored pieces of code interact can be complex and time-consuming to understand, we do not offer technical support or consulting.

Pagedone UI customers do get access to a private Discord community where you can ask questions and help others with their questions in return, but we don't offer first-party technical support or consulting here ourselves.

If you're unhappy with your purchase for any reason, email us at support@pagedone.io within 30 days and we'll refund you in full, no questions asked.
